mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.member_id, f.attraction_id, f.created_at, a.title, a.overview, a.address, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.rating FROM favorites f JOIN attractions a ON f.attraction_id = a.id WHERE f.attraction_id = #{attractionId} AND f.member_id = #{memberId}
